cn.title: 从黑名单中移除游戏
cn.info: ＊若要移除子代黑名单，总代黑名单也必需一并移除
cn.dialogDescription: 所有代理的子代皆会被影响！

en.title: Remove Black List
en.info: * If you remove the sub-agent from the blacklist, the general-agent in the blacklist must be removed as well.
en.dialogTitle: Remove game from the black list
en.dialogDescription: All sub accounts under the account will be affected!
